alert.note: Alert for Grant; Mahnomen; West Becker; West Otter Tail; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 12:22PM CST until January 21 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Very poor visibility at times. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwest and west central Minnesota and southeast North Dakota. * WHEN...Until 3 PM CST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: Grant; Mahnomen; West Becker; West Otter Tail; Wilkin
